title: Bhutan One Step Closer To World Cup After Shocking Victory Over Sri Lanka
teaser: Bhutan, the world's lowest-ranked soccer team, shocked the world on Tuesday when they beat Sri Lanka in a 2018 World Cup qualifier.
contentencoded:
Bhutan, the world's lowest-ranked soccer team, shocked the world on Tuesday when they beat Sri Lanka in a 2018 World Cup qualifier. NPR's Melissa Block speaks with Bhutanese journalist Namgay Zam in Thimphu, Bhutan, about the win.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
